My Work

Check out some of my projects

Travel Project Template Github

This is a simple website template for a travel agency. It utilizes technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript and SASS frameworks. It is fully responsive and can be easily implemented and optimized fore any travel agency.

Can not Choose App Github

This app allows you to input several options and chooses one them for you. It is created using Front End Technologies like React and Sass.

Expenser Github

This app helps you manage and organize your expenses. It uses google auth services to create an account for every user individualy, and stores its data on firebase.Furthermore is uses the Airbnb's Calendar Module in order to pick dates, and also utilizes front-end technologies such as React and Sass
